text:
e Care,GHR,carnitine palmitoyltransferase I deficiency
What is (are) inherited thyroxine-binding globulin deficiency ?,"Inherited thyroxine-binding globulin deficiency is a genetic condition that typically does not cause any health problems.  Thyroxine-binding globulin is a protein that carries hormones made or used by the thyroid gland, which is a butterfly-shaped tissue in the lower neck. Thyroid hormones play an important role in regulating growth, brain development, and the rate of chemical
